description.brazilian: Vença a Fase 1 dos Campos em qualquer Dificuldade.
description.english: Clear the Stage 1 of the Grasslands on any Difficulty.
description.russian: Пройдите первый этап
description.schinese: 任意难度下通关草原第1关。

description.brazilian: Vença a Fase 1 da Floresta em qualquer Dificuldade.
description.english: Clear the Stage 1 of the Forest with any character on any Difficulty.
description.russian: Пройдите первый этап
description.schinese: 用任意角色在任意难度下通过森林第1关。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Costureira
description.english: Unlock the Seamstress.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Швею.
description.schinese: 解锁裁缝。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Escultor
description.english: Unlock the Sculptor.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Скульптора.
description.schinese: 解锁雕塑师。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Lenhador
description.english: Unlock the Lumberjack.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Дровосека.
description.schinese: 解锁樵夫。

description.brazilian: Aprimore ou Repare 1 construção pela primeira vez.
description.english: Upgrade or Repair 1 building for the first time.
description.russian: Улучшите или восстановите 1 здание в первый раз.
description.schinese: 首次升级或维修1个建筑。

description.brazilian: Aprimore qualquer construção para o level 5.
description.english: Upgrade a building to level 5.
description.russian: Улучшите здание до 5-го уровня.
description.schinese: 将某个建筑升至5级。

description.brazilian: Complete todas as Fases dos Campos.
description.english: Clear all Stages of the Grasslands.
description.russian: Пройдите все этапы
description.schinese: 通关所有草原关卡。

displayName.brazilian: Mãos Extras não Vão te Ajudar

description.brazilian: Derrote a Grande Maligtopus com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.
description.english: Defeat the Great Maligtopus with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Великого Осквернога на любом персонаже на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败超大章鱼恶意体。

description.brazilian: Vença a Fase 4B dos Campos com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.
description.english: Clear the Stage 4B of the Grasslands with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Пройдите этап 4B
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度通关草原的第4B关。

description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 1000 de qualquer material.
description.english: Have more than 1000 of any material.
description.russian: Иметь более 1000 единиц любого материала.
description.schinese: 任意资源的持有量超过1000。

description.brazilian: Tenha mais de 20000 de ouro.
description.english: Have more than 20000 gold.
description.russian: Иметь более 20000 золота.
description.schinese: 持有的黄金超过20000。

description.brazilian: Encontre uma saída secreta pela primeira vez.
description.english: Find a secret treasure for the first time.
description.russian: Впервые найти секретное сокровище.
description.schinese: 首次发现隐藏宝藏。

displayName.brazilian: Mantenha Seus Tentáculos Longe de Mim!

description.brazilian: Derrote a Grande Maligtopus com 3 personagens diferentes na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.
description.english: Defeat the Great Maligtopus with 3 different characters on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Великого Осквернога на 3-х разных персонажах на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用3位不同角色在普通或以上难度击败超大章鱼恶意体。

description.brazilian: Encontre o Caminha Secreto para a Praia.
description.english: Find the Secret Path to the Beach.
description.russian: Найдите секретный путь к пляжу.
description.schinese: 发现前往海滩的隐藏路径。

description.brazilian: Encontre sua primeira saída secreta.
description.english: Find the first secret exit.
description.russian: Найдите первый секретных выход.
description.schinese: 首次发现隐藏出口。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Agricultora.
description.english: Unlock the Farmer.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Фермера.
description.schinese: 解锁农民。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Grande Maligmico pela primeira vez.
description.english: Defeat the Great Maligmic for the first time.
description.russian: Впервые победите Великого Пагубника.
description.schinese: 首次击败超级恶意体。

displayName.brazilian: A Conta de Água Vai ser Cara
displayName.schinese: 今天衣服可有点儿难洗

description.brazilian: Vença a Fase 6C da Floresta com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.

description.brazilian: Cozinhe 5 receitas diferentes na Cozinha.
description.english: Cook 5 different recipes in the Kitchen.

description.schinese: 在厨房烹饪5种不同的食物。

description.english: Sculpt 5 different statues in the Showroom.

description.schinese: 解锁渔夫。

description.brazilian: Repare o Porto.

description.schinese: 在厨房烹饪15种不同的食物。

description.russian: Победите Генерала-гаргулью любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.

description.brazilian: Complete todas as Fases do Deserto.
description.english: Clear all Stages of the Desert.
description.russian: Пройдите все этапы Пустыни.
description.schinese: 通关所有沙漠关卡。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie a Chaveira.
description.english: Unlock the Locksmith.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Замочницу.
description.schinese: 解锁锁匠。

description.brazilian: Vença o Desafio Masmorras e Lagartos Crescidos com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Clear Dungeons and Overgrown Lizards with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Пройдите Подземелья и ящерицы-переростки любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败冒险者小队。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Chefe Bardo Corrompido com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.
description.english: Defeat the Corrupted Bard Boss with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Босса Порочного Барда любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败腐化吟游诗人。

displayName.russian: У каждой змеи есть свои клыки

description.brazilian: Derrote a Hidra Grandiosa com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Defeat the Grand Hydra with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Великую Гидру любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败巨型九头蛇。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Maestro da Areia com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Defeat the Sand Conductor with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Песчаного Проводника любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败沙漠指挥家。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Maligchasm com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Defeat the Maligchasm with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Зломута любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败恶渊。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Maligchasm com 3 personagens diferentes na Dificuldade Normal ou acima.
description.english: Defeat the Maligchasm with 3 different characters on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Зломута на 3-х разных персонажах на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用3位不同角色在普通或以上难度击败恶渊。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Construtor.
description.english: Unlock the Builder.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Строителя.
description.schinese: 解锁建筑师。

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie o Reporter.
description.english: Unlock the Reporter.
description.russian: Разблокируйте Репортера.
description.schinese: 解锁记者。

description.brazilian: Vença a Fase 1 do Vulcão em qualquer Dificuldade.
description.english: Clear the Stage 1 of the Volcano on any Difficulty.
description.russian: Пройдите первый этап "Вулкана" на любой сложности.
description.schinese: 任意难度下通关火山第1关。

description.brazilian: Complete todas as Fases do Vulcão.
description.english: Clear all Stages of the Volcano.
description.russian: Пройдите все этапы Вулкана.
description.schinese: 通关所有火山关卡。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Núcle Malígno com qualquer personagem na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Defeat the Malignant Core with any character on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Злобное Ядро любым персонажем на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用任意角色在普通或以上难度击败恶意核心。

description.brazilian: Derrote o Núcle Malígno com 3 personagens diferentes na Dificuldade Normal ou Acima.
description.english: Defeat the Malignant Core with 3 different characters on Normal Difficulty or higher.
description.russian: Победите Злобное Ядро на 3-х разных персонажах на средней сложности или выше.
description.schinese: 用3位不同角色在普通或以上难度击败恶意核心。

description.brazilian: Cozinhe todas as receitas na Cozinha.
description.english: Cook all recipes in the Kitchen.
description.russian: Приготовьте все рецепты на Кухне.
description.schinese: 在厨房烹饪出所有食谱。

description.brazilian: Esculpa todas as estátuas na Galeria.
description.english: Sculpt all statues in the Showroom.
description.russian: Смастерите все скульптуры в Выставочном зале.
description.schinese: 在展厅内展出全部雕像。

displayName.brazilian: Vingança é um Prato que se Come Frio
displayName.english: Revenge is a Dish Served Cold
